src:
安联星展：顶级手套可能被踢出综指
04 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Chong Jin Hun
（吉隆坡4日讯）安联星展研究指出，如果橡胶手套制造商顶级手套（Top Glove Corp Bhd）的股价进一步下跌，则有可能被踢出富时隆综指名单。
安联星展分析员Quah He Wei今日在报告中指出，综指成分股的半年度检讨将根据11月30日的闭市价，变动将于12月生效。
“该公司目前的市值排在第35位，如果在评估期间跌至第36位或以下，则会自动被剔除。”
休市时，顶级手套起11仙或2.5%，报4.51令吉，为主要上升股之一，成交量有249万股。
以目前股价计算，公司市值达116亿5000万令吉。截稿时，顶级手套没有就安联星展的报告作出回应。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Top Glove at risk of being removed from KLCI — AllianceDBS

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Allianz Star Show: Top gloves may be kicked out of the KLCI
04 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Chong Jin Hun
KUALA LUMPUR (April 4): Allianz DBS research indicates that if the share price of rubber glove maker Top Glove Corp Bhd falls further, it may be kicked out of the list of the FBM KLCI.
Allianz DBS analyst Quah He Wei pointed out in the report today that the semi-annual review of the KLCI constituents will be based on the closing price on November 30, and the changes will take effect in December.
“The company’s current market capitalization is ranked 35th and will be automatically eliminated if it falls to 36th or below during the assessment period.”
At the time of the market, the top gloves were 11 cents or 2.5%, reported RM4.51, one of the main rising stocks, with 2.49 million shares traded.
Based on the current share price, the company's market capitalization reached RM 11.65 billion. At the time of writing, the top gloves did not respond to the report of Allianz DBS.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Top Glove at risk of being removed from KLCI — AllianceDBS

Via theedgemarkets.com
